## GitHub Starlines

**Create beautiful stargazers histograms of your repositories or gists.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/qoomon/starlines)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/qoomon/starlines?tab=readme-ov-file#usage)

> [!Tip]
> It can take some time until the image is ready, depending on the amount of stargazers to fetch and process. If you are eager to watch the image generation workflows progress jump to [workflow runs](https://github.com/qoomon/starlines/actions/workflows/create-starline.yaml).

### Parameters

#### Count the number of stargazers of a repository

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `owner` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |
| `repo` | `string` | `true` |  | Github repository name |  |

</details>

```txt
https://starlines.qoo.monster/assets/{owner}/{repo}
```

#### Count the number of stargazers of a gist

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `owner` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |
| `gist` | `string` | `true` |  | Gist ID |  |

</details>

```txt
https://starlines.qoo.monster/assets/{owner}/{gist}@gist
```

#### Count the number of stargazers of a user

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |

</details>

```txt
https://starlines.qoo.monster/assets/{username}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- antonmedv/spark -->
![Star Sparkline](https://stars.medv.io/antonmedv/spark.svg)
```

<div>
  <img src="https://stars.medv.io/antonmedv/spark.svg" alt="Star Sparkline" />
</div>
